name: Soldier Kingdom
description:
Defeat the Enemy King in this fast-paced hack and slash!

You are one of 25 Soldiers, and your collective goal is to kill the Enemy King 5 times.

Obviously, you all will meet some resistance. Odds are, several, if not most of you are going to die! Good luck out there!

Oh, one more thing! Our supplies are running low so any armor or weaponry you find is precious! Don't lose it!

If you're interested in further updates and more games in the future, visit my Twitter page!
